name: h3
description: The 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Composite Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat is a powerhouse on the field, designed for players seeking performance and style. With a slightly end-loaded swing feel and a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, this bat is USSSA 1.15 BPF certified, ensuring top-tier playability. Its two-piece composite design boasts a FLEX Composite Barrel for maximum performance and barrel responsiveness, while the Ring-Free Barrel Construction enhances barrel flex and overall production. The OLS Connection provides the stiffest connection to minimize vibrations for smoother swings, complemented by a TFX End Cap that increases forgiveness. Finished in a striking black, teal, and purple colorway, this bat also features a PFX Composite Handle for enhanced speed, power, and feel, along with a custom knob design and enhanced soft touch grip for superior control. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
category_path: 2026 Marucci CATX RCKLESS Composite Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat: MSBCRC8
